titles: The resoluer; or Curiosities of nature written in French by Scipio Du Plesis counseller and historiographer to the French King. Vsefull & pleasant for all
author: Dupleix, Scipion, 1569-1661.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.
notes: A translation of:  La curiosité naturelle.
The title page is engraved and signed: W. Marshall. sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Questions and answers --  Early works to 1800.
